select a.routine_id , a.name as routineName , #{dayOfWeek} as dayOfWeek , a.cycle_count , a.cycle_type , a.goal_value , a.goal_unit , a.display_order , c.routine_group_id , c.name as routineGroupName from routine a left outer join link_routine_group b on a.link_routine_group_id = b.link_routine_group_id left outer join routine_group c on b.routine_group_id = c.routine_group_id where 1=1 and a.member_id = #{memberId} and #{searchDate} between a.start_date and NVL(a.end_date,'9999-12-31')
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.mon = true)
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.tue = true)
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.wed = true)
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.thu = true)
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.fri = true)
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.sat = true)
and (a.cycle_type = 'DAY' or a.sun = true)
